title: Horrific Music And SFX
description: Always have high quality creepy music and audio available for your scary, horror projects with the Horrific Music and SFX pack.
longDescription: Preview: https://soundcloud.com/joe-oquinn/horrific-music-and-sfx-demo Always have high quality creepy music and audio available for your scary, horror projects with the Horrific Music and SFX pack. The Horrific Music and SFX pack includes over 24 tracks of loops, musical cues, and sound effects. Specifically, it offers 10 loops, 3 cues, 2 stingers, and 8 sound effects. Using industry quality instruments and production techniques, the standard of music in this pack is everything you would hope for. High quality compositions, professionally mixed and mastered...create a fantastic soundtrack to your project. For custom music, sound design, or any other game audio services visit my website for more information.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 24 
Number of Audio Cues: 24 
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs 
Does music\audio loop: Yes/No 
How many minutes of audio provided: 19 
How many sound FX: 8 
Intended Platform: All 
Documentation Included: Yes
